targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  Id
FROM LatencyTestResults  
WHERE LatencyTestResults.Id = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.TransmissionTechnology
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.Protocol
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.TestTool
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.TestMode
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.TestDuration
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.TestServer
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  LatencyTestParameters.MessagesPerSecond
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  LatencyTestParameters.MessageSize
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  SentMessages
FROM LatencyTestResults 
WHERE LatencyTestResults.Id = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  ReceivedMessages
FROM LatencyTestResults 
WHERE LatencyTestResults.Id = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  LostMessages
FROM LatencyTestResults 
WHERE LatencyTestResults.Id = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT 
  LatencyTestParameters.Comment
FROM LatencyTestParameters  
WHERE LatencyTestParameters.LatencyTestResultId = ${Test_Id:singlequote}

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  MinimumLatency AS "Latency - Minimum",
  AverageLatency AS "Latency - Average",
  MaximumLatency AS "Latency - Maximum",
  StandardDeviationLatency AS "Latency - Standard Deviation",
  MinimumJitter AS "Jitter - Minimum",
  AverageJitter AS "Jitter - Average",
  MaximumJitter AS "Jitter - Maximum",
  StandardDeviationJitter AS "Jitter - Standard Deviation"
FROM LatencyTestResults 
WHERE LatencyTestResults.Id = ${Test_Id:singlequote}
